text: EULJEUE RO 10 Agent Stop before Resume Dose surgery after surgery Oral Aspirin 7 days 24 h 80-160 mg daily Clopidogrel 5 days 24 h Load with 300-600 mg followed by 75 mg/day Prasugrel 7 days 24 h Bolus 60 mg, then 10 mg/day Ticagrelor 5 days 24 h Bolus 180 mg then 90 mg bd Intravenous Tirofiban 4-8 h 4-6 h 0.1-0.15 mcg/kg/min Eptifibatide 4-6 h 4-6 h 2 mcg/kg/min Cangrelor 60-90 min 4-6 h 0.75 mcg/kg/min
